pr_title: Fix expressions are supported as function-call lhs

timeline.message: Revamp function call recovery and add recovery tests
Revamp function call recovery and add recovery tests

timeline.bodyText:
Under ARG_LIST context, ARG_LIST_START is always there as an alternative.
In other contexts, ARG_LIST_START is added as an alternative only if allowFuncCall is true.
timeline.author: lochana-chathura

replies.bodyText:
Why is that needed?
What if I write expr() inside func-args?
replies.author: SupunS

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into incremental-parser

 Conflicts:
	compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerinalang/compiler/internal/parser/BallerinaParserErrorHandler.java

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't this be merged with isValidExprRhsStart?
Because there are other places where we use isValidExprRhsStart for the same purpose, and those should behave the same way right?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: This operation is a bit expensive. Can we avoid this?
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Used System.arraycopy() instead of arrayLists. HBT?
replies.author: lochana-chathura

timeline.bodyText:
Can we do it without starting a context? because it is also an expensive operation. Should use that only if theres no other way.
What if we give an alias, say "VARIABLE_REF_RHS", and that will call the seekMatchInExpressionRhs with the flag on/off
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Will the above logic be simplified, if we take the common things out, similar to the second switch-case?
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Common alternatives are located in the middle of array. Number of alternatives before common and after common, are different for each ctx. So are we going to add the common ones at the end?
replies.author: lochana-chathura

replies.bodyText: btw MEMBER_ACCESS_KEY_EXPR is missing as an alternative under COMPUTED_FIELD_NAME ctx. I think it's a mistake
replies.author: lochana-chathura
